sentences.en: All those who are in the heavens and the Earth beseech Him.
sentences.cn: 所有的人,不论在天堂还是在人间,都恳求他.

sentences.en: Exodus 33:18 And he said, I beseech thee, shew me thy glory.
sentences.cn: 出埃及记33:18,19摩西说 、 求你显出你的荣耀给我看.

sentences.en: I beseech a favor of you.
I beseech you to do this before it is too late.
sentences.cn: 我恳求你做做这件事吧,趁现在还来得及.

sentences.en: Let him go, I beseech you!
Let us not, I beseech you, sir , deceive ourselves.
sentences.cn: 为了阻止这场即将来临的风暴, 一切该做的都已经做了.

sentences.en: O LORD God of Israel, I beseech thee, tell thy servant.
sentences.cn: 耶和华以色列的神阿, 求你指示仆人.

sentences.en: Of what Church, I beseech you?
sentences.cn: 请问你:是什么教会的法令?

sentences.en: She beseeched him to cut out his drinking and his smoking.
She continued to beseech him not to disturb her.
sentences.cn: 她仍旧求他不要打搅她.

sentences.en: The commander began to beseech his immediate superior for reinforcements.
sentences.cn: 司令官向自己的直属上司请求支援.

sentences.en: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him.
sentences.cn: 所以我劝你们,要向他显出坚定不移的爱心来.

sentences.en: Wherefore I beseech you, be ye followers of me.

trans.tran_en: to eagerly and anxiously ask someone for something
